Rapid popularity growth of R language among not only academic, but
commercial communities poses also a few technical challenges. How to
make R code interoperable and easily accessible to developer team? How
to scale your models to sustain business needs? How to overcome initial
hurdles, caused by introducing yet another technology stack? My session
will cover a few practical solutions that aim to resolve such
difficulties in real-life scenarios.
